name: created_at
description: Date and time the language was created.

name: deleted_at
description: Date and time the language was deleted.

name: published_at
description: Date and time the language was published.

name: status
description: Status of the language (e.g. invisible, visible, deleted)

name: name
description: The name of the language (e.g. English, Spanish)

name: code
description: The ISO 639-1 code of the language (e.g. en, es)
